title: Original Hard (Prepatch)
description:
This Mod recreates the REAL hard difficulty from the first month of the game, before it was made easier.

Don't get me wrong, this was brutal - Dark Souls mode kinda ^-^

Thanks EternalNooblet for the first Version and Nyerguds & tomsons26 for the help to get started :)

Source Code: https://github.com/Lunak89/CnC_Remastered_TD_OriginalHard
